Author: dashlite
Title: [ICO][ANN][APRIL 2ND] DASHLITE.ORG - THE FUTURE PAYMENT SYSTEM
Body: DASHLITE.ORG The Future of Payments System - Global decentralize enterprise blockchain solution for global payments  WhitePaper available at: https://www.dashlite.org/docs/DashLite_Whitepaper.pdf Presentation available at: https://www.dashlite.org/docs/DashLite_Presentation.pdf  ICO Starts: 2nd April 2018  About Dashlite Coin Dashlite is a platform for the future of funding that powering dat for the new equity blockchain. While existing solutions offer to solve just one problem at a time, our team is up to build a secure, useful, & easy-to-use product based on private blockchain. It will include easy cryptocurrency payments integration, and even a digital arbitration system. At the end, Our aims to integrate all companies, employees, and business assets into a unified blockchain ecosystem, which will make business truly efficient, transparent, and reliable.  Why you should participate in the ICO?  By joining Dashlite.org at the first stage of its journey, reasons as follows: Dashlite.org is a blockchain based platform designed specifically for decentralization of the Payment System. Dashlite.org management team collectively has over 20years' experience in the Banking System.   Dashlite.org technical team is young, highly skilled & motivated, dynamic and economic.  Coin distribution events details:  Stage 1 >> Start Date 02 April 2018 – End Date : 02 May 2018 | Supply : 7,00,000 | Price : 0.50USD Stage 2 >> Start Date 03 May 2018  – End Date : 23 May 2018 | Supply : 7,00,000 | Price : 0.75USD Stage 3 >> Start Date 24 May 2018  – End Date : 03 June 2018 | Supply : 7,00,000 | Price : 1.00USD  Total Referral Bonus Of 19% Allocation of coins after: 30% - Payment of interest to investors 30% - Further development of the platform (according to the roadmap) 10% - Management of the exchange course of the coin and administration of the platform 11% - Advertising, media campaign + 19% - Direct Referral Bonus The rest 1,89,00,000 coins will be available for Public mining by Scrypt algorithm PoW/PoS   Partnership program for sale of coins at ICO You will receive rewards for every purchase made any user invited by you and by anybody of a lower level (to 5 levels down): Level 1: 8% Level 2: 5% Level 3: 3% Level 4: 2% Level 5: 1%  Roadmap September 2017    - Enhanced systems Network   Completed  June 2018 - Lending Program Start - Development Begins on Added Value   Products & Services - Cloud based transaction software implemented  July 2018 -   Coin Release - Trust Management - Membership in VISA and MasterCard  Payment Systems - Partner Programs - Public API -Mobile Applications - Short-Term Accumulation Accounts (“Money Box”) - Consultants Training Program and Training Center Franchise  February 2019 Deposit Limits -   Credit Cards -   Virtual Cards -   Cold Accumulative Accounts (Hardware Wallets) -   Professional Managers and Analysts -   Integration with Instant Transfer Systems  May 2019 - Obtaining SWIFT Participant Status - Creation of Personal IBAN Accounts  and Access of SWIFT - Integration of Biometric Authorization - Opening of Gateway to World’s  Cryptocurrency Exchanges - Fixed Crypto Checks - Introduction of Artificial Intelligence   System Users  For More Information Please Visit Website  : https://www.dashlite.org/ Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/DashLite-1993148577671270/ Twitter : https://twitter.com/dashlitecoin Telegram : https://t.me/dashliteofficial_chat Slack : https://dashlite.slack.com Medium : https://medium.com/@dashlite.org Reddit : https://www.reddit.com/user/dashlitecoin/ Google+ : https://plus.google.com/u/3/102173924863690726492
